self_reflections: Airplane Mode is a network-related setting that controls all wireless communications (cellular, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth). It would logically be found under the Network settings section, similar to how other connectivity options are organized there.

The goal is to turn on Airplane Mode, and "Airplane Mode" is directly available as a UI element in the Network app. Clicking on it will toggle the Airplane Mode setting, which is the most direct way to achieve the goal.
